reasoning: Follicular lymphoma incidence approximately 2.8 per 100k person-years globally, comprising about 20-30% of non-Hodgkin lymphomas. Data from SEER and international cancer registries circa 2000-2005.
source: Morton LM et al. (2006). Lymphoma incidence patterns by WHO subtype in the United States, 1992-2001. Blood. 107(1):265-276
